amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to ensure Sunday early voting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
